channel.title: Altseason on Archive 03
channel.description: Recent content in Altseason on Archive 03

item.title: Ethereum Breaks $4,000: Is This the Starting Gun for Altseason?
item.description: With Ethereum surpassing the $4,000 mark, anticipation for a full-blown altseason is growing. Three distinct characters engage in a deep discussion centered on data, growth potential, and potential risks to determine whether this is the signal for a new opportunity or a warning sign of an overheated market.
